title: Ticket #5332: Address doc confusion for DAGMan maxjobs and maxidle
description:
There is conflicting information for DAGMan maxjobs and maxidle on the DAGMan and condor_submit_dag pages of the manual. For example, maxidle is sometimes defined as counting jobs in terms of DAG nodes and sometimes relative to job processes (not clusters, which would be closer to DAG nodes in definition).

Additionally, there is no formal association of DAGMAN_MAX_JOBS_IDLE with "maxidle", and therefore no definition for it. It's only provided as an example for the CONFIG feature.

In CHTC, we've had MANY users struggle with the differences, specifics, similarities, etc., which has led to submit server performance issues when too many jobs are in the queue. I can only imagine (and htcondor-users threads show) that many outside of CHTC struggle as well.
remarks:
Switching this to the "ReviewCode" status, although it really should be "ReviewDoc".
